MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL16 postcode area of Denbigh, affecting properties in Prion, Peniel and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:01pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of broken equipment on the overhead cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:35pm on 10th March 2021
